Text.Page: You entered Camp Mournhome with Dorial's introduction.

You are a new breed of elin—an avenger. A reaper. You possess vast untapped potential, and you should never allow yourself to forget it.

Now go demonstrate your potential to the whole world!

I don't recognize you. Did you just arrive here?

No matter. Any help you can offer will be greatly appreciated. We're having trouble with some orcan deserters stealing our supplies. Can you help out?

That was...something else. I mean: Thanks for the help!

Those guys are just rank-and-file orcan soldiers that ran away during the fighting. They've been lurking out there, waiting for an unguarded moment to steal from our food supply.

But you taught 'em a lesson and they won't be back anytime soon!

Where are you from, ?"You don't want to know."

Heh! Top secret, eh? Makes sense: I'd heard we'd be getting some mercenaries to help us out! And here you are!

Well, you should probably report to Miayn—she's the administrator for the Honor Guard. She'll have your assignments.

You must be one of the new mercenaries I heard about. We've been waiting for you.

Here: This is for helping Dorial. It's just a small sign of my appreciation.
